languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс некоторое время молчит, затем начинает говорить — медленно, словно преодолевая сопротивление.{/n} "Во избежание утечек подробности заданий отдельных аколитов держатся в тайне. Все, что я могу сказать — это то, что основной угрозой, которой занималась Эмелина в Просторе Коронус, были ксеносы. В частности — рейды друкари на отдаленные системы. Савант идеально подходит для того, чтобы собрать данные об истории этой проблемы и найти подходящие методы борьбы с ней".

{n}Heinrix says nothing for a time, then begins to speak — slowly, as though he is fighting against resistance.{/n} "For the avoidance of leaks, the details of the objectives of specific acolytes shall remain a secret. All I can tell you is that the primary threat that Emelina was dealing with in the Koronus Expanse was xenos. In particular, Drukhari raids on distant systems. A Sage is ideally suited for gathering data about the chronology of this problem and finding appropriate methods for combatting it."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс некоторое время молчит, затем начинает говорить — медленно, словно преодолевая сопротивление.{/n} "Во избежание утечек подробности заданий отдельных аколитов держатся в тайне. languages.text: {n}海因里希一言不发。过了很久，他才慢慢开了口。他的语速很慢，仿佛有什么力量不让他说出这些话一样。{/n}“为了避免泄密，我没办法将审判庭侍仆的具体任务细节告诉你。我只能说，艾米莉娜主要负责对付科罗努斯扩区的异形威胁，尤其是那些专门袭击偏远星系的黑暗灵族。在这个问题上，贤者是最出色的人选。他们可以收集关于这个问题的历史情报，寻找合适的方法来解决问题。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix says nothing for a time, then begins to speak — slowly, as though he is fighting against resistance.{/n} "For the avoidance of leaks, the details of the objectives of specific acolytes shall remain a secret. All I can tell you is that the primary threat that Emelina was dealing with in the Koronus Expanse was xenos. In particular, Drukhari raids on distant systems. A Sage is ideally suited for gathering data about the chronology of this problem and finding appropriate methods for combatting it."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希一言不发。过了很久，他才慢慢开了口。他的语速很慢，仿佛有什么力量不让他说出这些话一样。{/n}“为了避免泄密，我没办法将审判庭侍仆的具体任务细节告诉你。我只能说，艾米莉娜主要负责对付科罗努斯扩区的异形威胁，尤其是那些专门袭击偏远星系的黑暗灵族。在这个问题上，贤者是最出色的人选。他们可以收集关于这个问题的历史情报，寻找合适的方法来解决问题。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix no dice nada durante un rato, pero por fin empieza a hablar con lentitud, como si luchara por sacar las palabras.{/n} «Para evitar posibles filtraciones, los objetivos exactos de ciertos acólitos deben mantenerse en secreto. Solo puedo decirle que la amenaza principal a la que debe enfrentarse Emelina en la Extensión de Koronus es la de los xenos. En concreto, los asaltos Drukhari en sistemas lejanos. Una sabia es perfecta para reunir datos cronológicos de este problema y dar con los métodos más adecuados para combatirlo».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix says nothing for a time, then begins to speak — slowly, as though he is fighting against resistance.{/n} "For the avoidance of leaks, the details of the objectives of specific acolytes shall remain a secret. All I can tell you is that the primary threat that Emelina was dealing with in the Koronus Expanse was xenos. In particular, Drukhari raids on distant systems. A Sage is ideally suited for gathering data about the chronology of this problem and finding appropriate methods for combatting it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix no dice nada durante un rato, pero por fin empieza a hablar con lentitud, como si luchara por sacar las palabras.{/n} «Para evitar posibles filtraciones, los objetivos exactos de ciertos acólitos deben mantenerse en secreto. Solo puedo decirle que la amenaza principal a la que debe enfrentarse Emelina en la Extensión de Koronus es la de los xenos. En concreto, los asaltos Drukhari en sistemas lejanos. Una sabia es perfecta para reunir datos cronológicos de este problema y dar con los métodos más adecuados para combatirlo».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスはしばらく何も言わなかったが、まるで抵抗と戦っているかのようにゆっくりと話し始めた。{/n}「漏洩を避けるため、特定のアコライトの目的の詳細は秘密のままとします。私が言えることは、エメリナがコロヌス・エクスパンスで対処していた主な脅威は異種族だということだけです。特に、デュカーリは遠方の星系を襲撃しています。賢者は、この問題に関する歴史的データを収集し、対処するための適切な方法を見つけるのに理想的です。」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix says nothing for a time, then begins to speak — slowly, as though he is fighting against resistance.{/n} "For the avoidance of leaks, the details of the objectives of specific acolytes shall remain a secret. All I can tell you is that the primary threat that Emelina was dealing with in the Koronus Expanse was xenos. In particular, Drukhari raids on distant systems. A Sage is ideally suited for gathering data about the chronology of this problem and finding appropriate methods for combatting it."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスはしばらく何も言わなかったが、まるで抵抗と戦っているかのようにゆっくりと話し始めた。{/n}「漏洩を避けるため、特定のアコライトの目的の詳細は秘密のままとします。私が言えることは、エメリナがコロヌス・エクスパンスで対処していた主な脅威は異種族だということだけです。特に、デュカーリは遠方の星系を襲撃しています。賢者は、この問題に関する歴史的データを収集し、対処するための適切な方法を見つけるのに理想的です。」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix garde le silence pendant un moment, puis répond lentement, comme s'il se forçait à prononcer ces mots.{/n} « Dans le but d'éviter les fuites, les détails des objectifs d'acolytes spécifiques doivent rester secrets. Tout ce que je peux vous révéler, c'est que la principale menace à laquelle devait faire face Emelina dans les Étendues de Koronus était les xénos. Notamment, des raids de Drukharis dans des systèmes reculés. Un sage est idéal pour rassembler des données sur la chronologie d'un tel problème et mettre au point des méthodes appropriées pour le combattre. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix says nothing for a time, then begins to speak — slowly, as though he is fighting against resistance.{/n} "For the avoidance of leaks, the details of the objectives of specific acolytes shall remain a secret. All I can tell you is that the primary threat that Emelina was dealing with in the Koronus Expanse was xenos. In particular, Drukhari raids on distant systems. A Sage is ideally suited for gathering data about the chronology of this problem and finding appropriate methods for combatting it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix garde le silence pendant un moment, puis répond lentement, comme s'il se forçait à prononcer ces mots.{/n} « Dans le but d'éviter les fuites, les détails des objectifs d'acolytes spécifiques doivent rester secrets. Tout ce que je peux vous révéler, c'est que la principale menace à laquelle devait faire face Emelina dans les Étendues de Koronus était les xénos. Notamment, des raids de Drukharis dans des systèmes reculés. Un sage est idéal pour rassembler des données sur la chronologie d'un tel problème et mettre au point des méthodes appropriées pour le combattre. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix schweigt eine Weile und beginnt dann zu sprechen – langsam, als bekämpfe er einen inneren Widerstand.{/n} "Um Informationslecks zu vermeiden, sind die Einzelheiten der Ziele einzelner Akolythen streng geheim. Ich kann Euch nur sagen, dass Emelina vor allem mit der Bedrohung der Koronus-Ausdehnung durch Xenos befasst war. Um genau zu sein, mit Überfällen durch Drukhari in abgelegenen Systemen. Weise sind perfekt dafür geeignet, Daten über die Chronologie dieses Problems zu sammeln und angemessene Methoden zu seiner Bekämpfung zu finden."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix says nothing for a time, then begins to speak — slowly, as though he is fighting against resistance.{/n} "For the avoidance of leaks, the details of the objectives of specific acolytes shall remain a secret. All I can tell you is that the primary threat that Emelina was dealing with in the Koronus Expanse was xenos. In particular, Drukhari raids on distant systems. A Sage is ideally suited for gathering data about the chronology of this problem and finding appropriate methods for combatting it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix schweigt eine Weile und beginnt dann zu sprechen – langsam, als bekämpfe er einen inneren Widerstand.{/n} "Um Informationslecks zu vermeiden, sind die Einzelheiten der Ziele einzelner Akolythen streng geheim. Ich kann Euch nur sagen, dass Emelina vor allem mit der Bedrohung der Koronus-Ausdehnung durch Xenos befasst war. Um genau zu sein, mit Überfällen durch Drukhari in abgelegenen Systemen. Weise sind perfekt dafür geeignet, Daten über die Chronologie dieses Problems zu sammeln und angemessene Methoden zu seiner Bekämpfung zu finden."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix bir süre hiçbir şey söylemiyor, ardından dirence karşı savaşıyormuş gibi, yavaşça konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Sızıntı ihtimalinden kaçınmak adına spesifik havarilerin vazifeleri gizli kalmalıdır. Sana söyleyebileceğim tek şey şu: Emelina'nın Koronus Enginliği'nde ilgilendiği başlıca tehdit zenolardı. Daha net olmak gerekirse, ücra sistemlerdeki Drukhari baskınları. Bir Âlim, bu sorun hakkındaki kronolojik verileri toplamak ve nasıl mücadele edilebileceği konusundaki doğru metodları bulmak için ideal kişidir."
